author: agemanning
content:
Not sure where best to post this, but I'm doing an experiment and go, js and java (Prysm, Teku and Lodestar) are violating the prune backoffs in gossipsub. I'm assuming each client is using a > 30 second prune back-off. 
Here are some initial statics I've got for versions that are doing this:
```
CLIENT BREAKDOWN
----------------------------------------

Prysm:
  Total violations: 58 (43.9%)
  GRAFT after messages: 29
  Prune backoff violations: 29
  Top versions: Prysm/91b44360fcd74bad41f38b79bb3b05094408a2d0(28), Prysm/eafef8c7c803f5a63755a9a63377c3bd6459aa41(14), Prysm/b4a66a09933007af2ff25a8970daaaf810896038(6)
  OS info: unknown(58)

Teku:
  Total violations: 44 (33.3%)
  GRAFT after messages: 22
  Prune backoff violations: 22
  Top versions: Teku/v25.5.0(26), Teku/v25.6.0(14), Teku/v25.4.1(2)
  OS info: linux-x86_64(44)

Lodestar:
  Total violations: 30 (22.7%)
  GRAFT after messages: 15
  Prune backoff violations: 15
  Top versions: Lodestar/v1.32.0(14), Lodestar/v1.29.0(6), Lodestar/v1.31.0(6)
```
